body.p: T1/E1 transceiver (DS2155) is having an 8-bit parallel port interface for configuration purpose. DS2155 parallel port is interfaced with MPC8306 local bus controller in GPCM mode as shown in the following figure. DS2155 is interfaced on CS2# of MPC8306.

p.b: Figure 10. External Cable Connection for the Stand-alone SOM Boot Mode
